inference to access all the capabilities

unlock the edge for the cloud developer
and unlock the cloud for the embedded

now when you're out at the edge one of

and what you end up with is a cycle and

to Train ml models using the cloud is

CPU hungry inference is data hungry you

you're using a common set of tools and

this is a really important one when we

a lot of aren't particularly industrial
